title: Коронный выход
overview: Talk-show project of the START video service and the Malaya Bronnaya Theater. Director Konstantin Bogomolov will talk to Nikita Efremov, Lyubov Aksenova, Marina Zudina, Vladimir Mishukov, Irina Starshenbaum and other actors via video link. As frankly as if the conversation had taken place in private
